description: Try our easy to follow Toasted Coconut French Toast recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Toasted Coconut French Toast Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tsp rice malt syrup (optional, to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: In a shallow bowl, whisk together the cream, milk, eggs, vanilla extract and cinnamon. In a separate shallow bowl, add shredded coconut.

Heat half of the butter in a frying pan or skillet on low heat until melted. Meanwhile, place two pieces of bread into the egg mixture and coat both sides. Allow the excess to drip off and then place into the shredded coconut, coating both sides. Add coated bread to the frying pan and allow to cook for 2 minutes or until bottom is golden. Flip over and cook other side until golden. Set aside. Repeat with the other two pieces of bread.
To serve, place two slices of toast onto each plate and top with yoghurt, raspberries and a drizzle of rice malt syrup, if desired.
